entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
